Card 4: The Future
Five of Cups

Five of Cups
 
The Future - This card predicts possible developments, assuming 
the status quo. These are generally short-term predictions and 
do not depict an ultimate conclusion.
 
# Five of Cups in light: The foundation or basis of the subject 
that has already happened refers to contemplating recognizing 
that loss is a natural part of life 
 
*****************************************************************
